what: Add Layers to Existing Map — felt_add_map_layers
title: Add Layers to Existing Map — felt_add_map_layers
Add Layers to Existing Map — felt_add_map_layers
code: felt_add_map_layers(   map_id,   name = NULL,   file_names = NULL,   fill_color = NULL,   stroke_color = NULL )

title: Add Layers to Existing Map — felt_add_map_layers
text: map_id map identifier url, https://felt.com/map/Readable-Name-map_id name Name layer file_names Files include fill_color Color fill shape , typically hexcode. Defaults NULL.v stroke_color Color outline shape , typically hexcode. Defaults NULL.

title: Add Layers to Existing Map — felt_add_map_layers
Add Layers to Existing Map — felt_add_map_layers
code: if (FALSE) { # has_felt_key() felt_add_map_layers(map_id = 'Rockland-2024-Districts-TBI8sDkmQjuK2GX9CSiHiUA',                     file_names = fs::path_package('feltr',  'towns.geojson'),                     name = 'Towns') }

Create a new map — felt_create_map
code: felt_create_map(   title = NULL,   basemap = NULL,   layer_urls = NULL,   lat = NULL,   lon = NULL,   zoom = NULL )

title: Create a new map — felt_create_map
text: title Title use map. Defaults NULL. basemap Basemap new map. Defaults NULL. Can URL color hex code layer_urls vector URLs generate layers map. Defaults NULL. lat latitude center map. Defaults NULL. lon longitude center map. Defaults NULL zoom zoom level initialize map .

title: Create a new map — felt_create_map
Create a new map — felt_create_map
code: felt_create_map(title = 'feltr example') #> Error in httr2::req_perform(req): HTTP 401 Unauthorized.

Delete an existing map — felt_delete_map
code: if (FALSE) { # has_felt_key() map <- felt_create_map(title = 'feltr example') felt_delete_map(map_id = map$id) }

code: if (FALSE) { # has_felt_key() layer <- felt_add_map_layers('TBI8sDkmQjuK2GX9CSiHiUA', 'test', fs::path_package('feltr', 'towns.geojson')) felt_delete_map_layer(map_id = 'Rockland-2024-Districts-TBI8sDkmQjuK2GX9CSiHiUA', layer) }

what: Get Map Information from Map ID — felt_get_map
title: Get Map Information from Map ID — felt_get_map
text: felt_get_map() returns identifying information map felt_get_map_layers() returns information layer map felt_get_map_elements() returns shapes layer map felt_get_map_geojson() downloads geojson version map returns path felt_get_map_sf returns sf version map

title: Get Map Information from Map ID — felt_get_map
code: felt_get_map(map_id)  felt_get_map_elements(map_id)  felt_get_map_layers(map_id)  felt_get_map_geojson(map_id, path = tempfile(fileext = ".geojson"))  felt_get_map_sf(map_id)
